Title: Family Heist
Writer: Sébastien Blanc (collaboration), Pascal Chaumeil (collaboration), Carole Giacobbi (original screenplay), Carole Giacobbi (story), Michèle Giacobbi (original screenplay), Michèle Giacobbi (story), Joe Maggio (collaboration), Nicolas Poiret (collaboration), Juliette Sales (adaptation), Juliette Sales (dialogue), Juliette Sales (screenplay), Fabien Suarez (adaptation), Fabien Suarez (dialogue), Fabien Suarez (screenplay)
Actors: Jean Reno, Reem Kherici, Camille Chamoux, Pascal Demolon
Plot: A high-profile burglar reconciles with his two daughters (half-siblings) to help him retaliate against his ex-partner who betrayed him.
